subsection_analysis.refined_text: • Avignon Festival: Established in 1947, the Avignon Festival is one of the most important contemporary performing arts events in the world, attracting artists and audiences from around the globe6.
Cultural Activities • Opéra Grand Avignon: Attend a performance at the Opéra Grand Avignon for a cultural treat.
